Hi! I'm Noah.

I do a bit of everything.

Harpie

.NET Blazor C# SQL JavaScript Solidity

Harpie is simple, non-custodial redundancy for your Ethereum tokens.
Harpie is a blockchain startup supported by Georgia Tech CREATE-X, Duke Blockchain, and many more.

Pet the Dog

Unity C#

My first foray into the world of game development, Unity and C#, Pet the Dog is my very first personal project seen to completion. It features hand drawn art, dynamic instance generation and a loving dog. I created this project as a gift for my SO (spoiler alert: she loved it).

DE2 Amiga Bot

Altera FPGAs VHDL Assembly

Using various IR and odometry sensors, our team programmed a pathfinding algorithm for a DE2 Amiga Bot in Assembly and VHDL. Our robot uses hardware interrupts to drift at blazing speeds around landmarks.
